website_summaries.verdict: This high-quality, luxury dog blanket is an ultimate source of comfort for your precious pups.
pros: Doubled-layered micro plush allows for supreme pet comfort
cons: Lint can shed off of blanket after heavy machine washing

customer_reviews.title: Lint everywhere! Even after several washes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blanket previously and my golden retriever puppy loved it. So I bought a few more and unfortunately after 4 washes there is still lint everywhere! The texture seemed a bit different than my other blanket and I had to use over 10 lint removing sheets (front and back of blanket) in order to remove the extra lint. After 30 minutes of removing lint, I am definitely wondering what changed between these blankets and my previous blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves blankets and comforters but then she ruins them all and gets the stuffing and string all over the place, finally this company made a blanket with no stuffing. It's super soft and durable. My toddler also loves this and the dogs bed pretty much everyone in my family has been snuggled up with the doggie and this blanket. It's a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Connus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pet blanket for small dog!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket for my 8lb special needs Miniature Pinscher who loves to bury in soft blankets. It's the perfect size, very soft, washes well and dries quickly. The material is silky soft, not a microplush that pills or snags, and is absorbent. The color is perfect for my grey interior decor. Packaging is minimal and no issues with prompt delivery. I ordered 1 when I adopted my dog 3 months ago, and have ordered 3 more for her since then bc they're perfect in size and texture! Love this blanket. Shown below in both car and dog bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Very thin blanket...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this blanket and another for our dog - both were around the same price. This one is much thinner, however it is still very soft. If you're looking for a simple cozy blanket this is fine, but if you're looking for something with more thickness or something for them to use on a hard floor or crate, I'd look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn F

customer_reviews.title: Functional, Comfy and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket, it's super soft and comfy. My dog loves it a lot, he took all his favorite toys and just chillin on the couch. Plus the grey color matched with his bed so he could sleep in style :) It's also a great way to cover the couch from all his hair and nails. I rated this blanket 5 stars, for function, comfort level and price. Thanks for making such great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Bella NTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pet blankie
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the softest blankets I have ever felt! I almost wanted it for myself. Anyways I bought this for my adopted rescue doggie from Tawain. I slept with it for the three nights before she arrived in the US to get my scent on it. When I gave it to her the first night I had her she loved it. It is now her blanket and anywhere I put it she will sleep. It is great quality and super soft! Not too hot too so I use it as her crate blanket. Love it! I'm thinking of getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: kkllcc

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS high quality
customer_reviews.text: These are the HIGHEST QUALITY dog beds and blankets you can find ANYWHERE! We looked at all the 'specialty dog catalogs' and Pet-Fusion were the lowest priced, high quality beds available. My Standard poodle LOVES HIS new bed and washable blanket. We recommend these products without reservation......
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Best fur baby blanket I’ve ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this blanket yesterday so I can only say that, upon close inspection, this appears to be very high quality, extremely plush and very well made... equally soft on both sides. It’s lightweight yet warm. I love it and so does my little fur baby! This is better quality than expected. Better than most human baby blankets, and believe me, I’ve looked a lot in local stores trying to find a really nice blanket for my little poodle. I’m so glad I finally found it! She deserves the best! (See photos) I’m going to see if they make one big enough for me!
customer_reviews.author: P. D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice blanket.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few months now and really like it. It's the perfect size for my 40 lb beagle/lab mix. I've tried different material (fleece, sherpa, etc.) and her hair sticks to everything. A couple of brisk waves standing outside and all of her hair seems to fly off this thing. It's also doesn't seem very staticy which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Still tears it up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this several months ago because one of the reviews I read said that it was the one blanket the persons dog hadn’t chewed up. My dog has chewed up every blanket and bed I have ever given him. Beds are the worst because they only last about an hour before they are reduced to confetti. Blankets are perfectly ripped into about 1 inch strips. He didn’t touch this blanket for about a week but now after two months it is still in one piece but full of holes. At least he hasn’t reduced it into multiply strips.
customer_reviews.author: Robin R.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of them to put over my leather cushions for my couch and love seat to protect from nail scratches.I could not be happier! The material is wonderful and although I have to adjust it now and again, it doesn't show dirt or hairs (my dogs do not shed excessively, though). It is easy to brush off any lint. I love the material of these. They have held up really well. I haven't washed them yet, but have had no need to. I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: dakotadreamer

customer_reviews.title: My 5 rescue dogs give them a 5 and so do we
customer_reviews.text: We have 5 rescued dogs and they are old. All have been mistreated so much that they need something to sleep with that’s soft enough for covering them up or for them to bunch up and rest their head on. These are perfect and they are durable. I bought one for each of them and they get a great deal of use by these old ladies and gents. I wash them at least once a week and they have stood up excellently.
customer_reviews.author: JoeJustJoe

customer_reviews.title: Everybody Is Happy!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves her Pet Fusion dog bed so much I bought her not just one but three of them so she could feel safe and snuggly in various locations. When I wanted to buy her a dog blanket I figured the folks at Pet Fusion knew how to make great dog beds so I would try their blankets. She adores her blanket! I have a soft throw blanket on the end of my bed she adores so I thought this blanket might be similar. Now she sleeps every night snuggled in her dog blanket on her dog bed. It makes me happy to see her so content!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Carrigan

customer_reviews.title: No pet hair in the wash tub to clog! Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about spending twice as much for this, than a human blanket at a retail store. So glad I gave in. My yellow lab sheds like crazy. Almost clogging the wash tub. This blanket does NOT hold pet hair. Shake it outside before washing, and regular vacuuming, done. Very happy I bought it, no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Tressie Ozley

customer_reviews.title: My doggie loves!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my dog a new dog bed, I also bought him a new blanket, as his old blanket had been appropriated by the fat cat in the house! It is the softest blanket and my dog loves to scrunch it up to lay his head on it. It clean up beautifully and remains soft and supple. A good buy for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: BarbarainAustin

customer_reviews.title: We put their beds and 2 of these in there and they loved it and stayed warm
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because we were flying from Japan to California and at the last minute we got told we couldn't take the pups in cabin and we had to put them in cargo. We put their beds and 2 of these in there and they loved it and stayed warm. I mean next time I would put more in there but, for the last minute change I loved the fact that it went great. The blanket doesn't fall apart like other dog blankets and they look brand new till this date.
customer_reviews.author: nohemi

customer_reviews.title: This blanket makes my dog very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the PetFusion blanket to go with the PetFusion dog bed. The size was perfect, I bought a size medium. The blanket tucks in nicely into the corners of the bed and stays put most of the time. My dog Emma loves both the blanket and the bed. The blanket also helps keep the bed clean and is easy to wash. I am thrilled with the purchase and the lightning quick delivery. I've only had it a few weeks now so I can't really say how it will hold up, but so far, so good. Thank you for a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: animal lover

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy maintenance and holds up well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the blanket at the same time as the pet fusion memory foam bed. I put the blanket on top of the bed to help keep the bed cleaner - it is much easier to wash a blanket than the entire bed every week. We live in an area with lots of snow and slush so it isn’t unusual for wet paws and a wet belly to be on the bed. You can easily throw this blanket in the washer/dryer and always have a clean, fresh, dry bed for your pup. Blanket is a perfect match to the bed so it looks like it was specifically made for the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Midland Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great! Need Bigger
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and actually feels cool to the touch. The Grey is a very nice color! My only complaint is that the XL size isn't quite as big as I need. But that's not the Seller's fault, they clearly laid out the measurements which is why I bought 2. But it's still not quite big enough to cover a sofa. If I drape a section of my couch, it's not long enough to stay up once my pet comes and sits on it. I'm using Queen Sized sheets at the moment plus these 2. I'll definitely buy more as these look much nicer than the bed sheets I'm currently using.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi V

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs now have orthopedic issues, so I purchased 3 beds for them. One bed is in our living room/TV area, and the other two beds are for nighttime. Boy oh boy, do they love these beds. Although my dogs' favorite hobby is shedding, I do find the beds and the soft blankets slightly challenging to de-fur. I use a fur removal silicone brush daily, and that takes care of the majority of the fur festival. I am truly satisfied and pleased with these beds, and am happy that the blankets do cover them well!. Thanks for all you do.
customer_reviews.author: KT6

customer_reviews.title: Great for animals with anxiety!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very skittish cat. This blanket was on a listicle of products people were loving. It’s soft and warm without making the cat over heat. I snuck up on her while she was on the couch and put this blanket on her. As I was lying it on top of her small body, she was hesitant, but once I let the blanket go, she completely relaxed and fell asleep. It helps keep her calm if my son freaks her out. I bought a second, larger one for my dog that 1) loves to be under blankets, and 2) has been anxious and lonely since our older dog died. She also loves it and likes to burrow underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Soft and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Our dog uses this blanket when he's on our bed. Lately, we've been taking it with us to the living room during the day, as something he can lay on when he's having a bully stick or just for continuity (a certain green ball and this blanket go everywhere). I didn't realize how much he liked it until today, when he insisted I go back into the bedroom after I left it inside! The blanket is very soft, lightweight (nice for our 16-pounder) and washes well. It was an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pet blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these for use with my senior pets. They are soft and great to line kennels, lay on floors or furniture, etc. They wash incredibly well - I wash them 1-2 times per day (yes, per day) and they hold up well. Stains wash off easily and hair does not get stuck in them. They look as new today as they were the day they arrived. So soft and cool to the touch. Love the blanket! Getting ready to order more...
customer_reviews.author: Tigerbear

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and plush!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent but my super chewer destroyed it by eating it. She has to learn to stop doing that so no more blankets for awhile. VERY soft and ni material though. I need to find something durable for her as well as another sturdy bed. I'm using a different brand that finally switched to a different more durable cover for the bed but I'm sure she'd be more comfy in one made better and get fusion doesn't disappoint, just don't know how durable their huge bed is. The one that's 40x something.
customer_reviews.author: (Frank) Francisco Figueroa Jr

customer_reviews.title: Soft and adored by both women and dogs.
customer_reviews.text: My fiance and I got a new couch and our dog is allowed on the furniture but only when a blanket is down. He seems to love the blanket and often has to fight over it with my fiance since she likes how soft the blanket is and is, of course, always cold. I hope it lasts a long time and can keep surviving the washing machine like it has so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bosh

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Super soft dog blankets
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves these blankets, and honestly so do I!!! They are so soft, lightweight but durable, warm, and high quality. We loved it so much we got another! They come in different sizes, the small is a great snuggle blanket for my little guy (16lb Boston), and the extra large works great as a throw blanket.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Ruffled blankets for bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go with the pet bed i purchased at the same time. The material is soft, little plush (not much), and two sided. Color matches the per bed, and stays within it pretty good. My kittens lay on it whenever they are in their room sleeping at night or when i am at work. However, the blanket is small for even the Small Pet Bed I purchased. So ita not like you can ruffle it up for them to cuddle in or under. It lays flat to the bottom of the let bed. But all in all, i guess ot works for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Williams

customer_reviews.title: Comfort in the car!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to use this on the couch for my pup to lay on but we took the no furniture route with her. I have a waterproof seat protector in the back seat of my car. I wanted to make it more comfortable for her to snuggle into and boy does she ever! If she's not hanging her snout out the window she's snoozing on this!
customer_reviews.author: KMA

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Its great in many aspect but I don't think its a very good value for the item, I feel there are many substitutions out there that may not be 100% the same but won't be very far. I don't have a good suggestion, but I got this when i got my first dog, and since then I got many other, so from new experience, its good if you have just this one blanket that you use on every occasion, but if you travel around and whatnot, this isn't a good value. but thats just my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Anna Wu

customer_reviews.title: Puppy approved
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these blankets, because my little puppy shredded the terry towels I put down for him. He has not been able to shred these plush blankets (yet), but he has tried! He loves his blanket and carries it all over the house with him. These were the perfect solution to the shredding towels which he was actually eating. I highly recommend this product - and I will be buying two more soon.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality & so soft
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blanket for the PetFusion bed that I ordered at the same time. The quality is excellent - very, very soft & cuddly, yet stays tucked into the edges of the bed quite well. It hasn’t been washed yet, but I am not at all concerned. My little poodle likes to dig in her bed, so that she loves this blanket, it is SOFT & despite her “nest building,” it looks like new. She & I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best ortho dog beds - period.
customer_reviews.text: Have tried all iterations of beds and I only wish I found these earlier. The cost is well worth it. I have three, and my dogs love them. The quality is top notch from the fabric to the waterproof interior foam. The border foam is at just the right height, allowing animals to rest heads over the edge, which they seem to love. Yes yes yes. Buy this once and never waste money on inferior beds again.
customer_reviews.author: KSL

customer_reviews.title: Quality Blankets and Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Blanket was plush and you can tell that it's made of quality. Dogs loved it. Reached out to PetFusion and their customer service was superb. They responded right away. I will buy these blankets again in the future, once my puppies mature a little more (AKA stop tearing up everything! LOL).
customer_reviews.author: C.H. in Goodyear

customer_reviews.title: My dog absolutely loved this blanket from the first moment we gave it ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loved this blanket from the first moment we gave it to her. it quickly became her favorite blanket, so much so that i now have 2 in every size for every place in our house that she sleeps on, the sofa, the loveseat, the ottoman, her beds, the car, and i just purchased another one for the kennel she goes to when we are away. The color is great and the blanket holds up well with many washings. The customer service is as good as their blankets are, if there is a need.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This is so soft and just the right size. When we noticed our cat loves our human-sized plush blankets, we had one of those at the foot of our bed for a while. That was a bit much, and our big blankets were getting filled quickly with cat fur. This has been a perfect replacement. Doesn't pick up much fur at all, and is easy to clean and less bulky on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Joy_Is_Rebellious

customer_reviews.title: Just a thought!!!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket isn't as durable or chew resistant as advertised. My 9.5 month old pitbull puppy destroyed one of these blanket corners in <48 hours. However, the blanket was immediately replaced and my interaction with Lauren was outstanding. If you're looking for a more durable/chew resistant blanket try this out, my pooch may be the exception to chewing, lol. This was definitely a good purchase for sure. Great customer service, especially from Lauren.
customer_reviews.author: Jaja D. Amani

customer_reviews.title: The Pup LOVES it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I do like it but our little doxie, Captain Morgan LOVES it! I like the size and he likes the softness. This was a present for his 5th birthday and he couldn't wait to unwrap it once he figured out what it was. We seem to be having an early fall in Kansas this year - it was 48 degrees this AM and, after his bathroom trip outside, he snuggled right up in his new blankie!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Sifers

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This dog blanket is soooo nice! Bought it to cover part of our couch. It’s so soft and nice I’ve seen my spouse using it as a blanket to cover up. It doesn’t attract the dog hair like some of the other blankets. Washes and dries beautifully. Would definitely buy it again. Color is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Head sized hole w/in two weeks from a very minor chewer
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes out of the gate as it seemed to be good quality, our lab puppy isn't much of a chewer but still suckles on this in his sleep. It had a hole the size of his head within about 2 weeks. IMO not worth the money as they don't appear to withstand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Z.

customer_reviews.title: Not a hairy blanket
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why but this blanket doesn't seem to collect as much hair as the others I've had. Durable and cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lahrman

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I was worried about buying blankets that ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I was worried about buying blankets that would just accumulate dog hair but these really don't, and my dogs shed a lot. They are durable against "nesting" and are very easy to wash and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Itty Bitty
customer_reviews.text: Tiny! Wouldn’t cover half of my golden retriever. Should specify it is for cats.
customer_reviews.author: Sarabiarora

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this blanket
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blanket for my young dog who has short fur and she loves it. She snuggles in it when she goes to lay down to sleep. It is very soft and warm for her and seems to be made of quality materials. It also stands up well when washed as it shows no degradation.
customer_reviews.author: C. Scaffa

customer_reviews.title: Softest Blanket Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the large and medium blankets for my two Russian Blue cats and they are in love! I am actually envious and thinking of purchasing one for myself also. They are so incredibly soft and warm and the girls love snuggling in them. They are extremely well made - I washed and dried both of them before using and they came out perfect. This was an excellent purchase and I would highly recommend this blanket to any pet owner!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Small
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14 lbs Jack Russell Terrier and a Medium is still fairly small for her. It covers her fine but wasn't as big as I expected. You should measure to make sure it will fit as you expect it to. Overall was easy to wash and throw in the dryer, had no issues with fuzz balls. Very soft and dog approved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, soft blanket. Already been peed on once, but washed up thoroughly. Nice color, cats like it. I'm hoping it holds up to more peeing (though I'd rather not deal with this) and more washing! I'd buy it again as I think the other cat is jealous. Would work just putting on a floor as well (as long as you don't have a carpet peeer!).
customer_reviews.author: Mg17

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: We bought 1 of these so our dog's bed is covered but liked it so much that we bought 2 more to put where she likes to sleep on the furniture. They are easy to just shake clean and wash easily. We shake them every day and are pleased with how it helps keep the dog hair minimized in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Super soft blanket for burrowing dogs
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is super soft. If your dog likes to burrow, then I definitely recommend getting a size larger than you would otherwise. I have a 15 pound Chihuahua mix. I ordered the medium dog blanket and it's barely large enough to cover him once he does all of his twisting and burrowing inside of it. The small would definitely have been too small. I wish they had additional colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Angela B

customer_reviews.title: Velvety Soft Dog Cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought the extra large blanket to protect the sofa from my puppy jumping up on the furniture and wearing down the fibers. The blanket is very velvety soft but still able to protect my light colored fabric from getting dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T. Nierman

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the large. Way too small for my 26 Lb. dog to get cozy. He doesn't like it and pushes it out of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Marilee D

customer_reviews.title: Future blanket purchases will be for this one
customer_reviews.text: Had this blanket for a few months now. Since purchase it has held up perfectly, multiple washes and still as soft as day 1 purchase with no stains from dog drool or urine. Seems durable as dog bites, pulls, and scratches at it to arrange the bed and no holes or stretching notices. Overall I love this blanket and so does my dog. I will be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: The size and softness....perfect for my beagles
customer_reviews.text: I love these blankets. They are soft and snuggly. Because of their small size, I can use them wherever the beagles decide to take their naps. I have 4 of them. I use them at home, at our mountain cabin and traveling in the motorhome. They are Millie beagle's and Buddy beagle's favorite....kinda like a toddler who drags her blanket around. And they wash well.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie Brown

customer_reviews.title: OMG this is soft!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put down on a leather chair that my kitties like to lie on. It is SO SOFT. I'm seriously buying one as a throw for me. You can't tell it's for animals because the color is really pretty (two-sided). I don't know how well it washes but will update my review when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again and again!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was being over the top buying my dog a soft blanket but I wanted to keep her new orthopedic bed cover clean. Well my plan backfired and my dog does not use it as a protective sheet but as a woobie. She snuggles into it and sometimes even makes it into a pillow. Our once scared car traveler now fights us to get into her car bed to sleep!! Money well spent!!
customer_reviews.author: TravelGal

customer_reviews.title: Quality is nice but value missing for the smallest size.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, high quality dog blanket. The seams are well done and seem like they would withstand daily use. For $17 and change, though, the small size is TEENY, and not such high quality that I would repurchase. The medium would have been a better buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shops-a-lot

customer_reviews.title: This is a great blanket, Libby loves it
customer_reviews.text: I only wish it were bigger. Otherwise a great blanket. Dog hair comes off easily and that is what I was looking for in a new blanket for Libby my rescue pit. Would probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mjkilb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blanket for the couch
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is perfect. It’s incredibly soft and durable. I have washed it 6 times and you would never know. Great way to keep the dog odor off the couch. I just wish it came in a cream color.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Soft
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a day, it looks durable and is soft. I personally love the way it is made. My Labrador ‘Dixie’ slept on it last night. It’s smooth and soft perfect for their cost To move around on!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Von D

customer_reviews.title: Wrap your loved pet in fleecy love
customer_reviews.text: Great materials used for the blaket. It is soft and comfy. My kids wanted to use it and not give it to the dog. I bought brown and I don't know if it's described as reversible but the other side is off white which shows dirt easier than dark colors. Company is awesome to work with. They stand behind what they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Cup Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little Yorkie!!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl has loved this blanket from the very first day! It's soft and cuddly, and because it's not too small, nor too large, she can fluff it up (what we call "floofing") just the way she likes it. She will use her nose, her paws, and even her teeth to situate the blanket to suit her, then turn round and round and lie right in the middle, sleeping until morning. This was a perfect pick!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought two because I like them
customer_reviews.text: Are use this on top of my dogs beds so that I don’t have to clean the entire bed constantly. They’ve held up really well with a chocolate Labrador. I now have two of them because I like them so much.
customer_reviews.author: LovesToBake

customer_reviews.title: Durable and my dog loves the blanket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this blanket for the first time two years ago. I decided recently I needed to replace it with a new one and loved it so much that I reordered this blanket. It looks nice in my dogs kennel and it held up really well. The quality is great. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This blanket feels really nice, and it's tough too. No loose threads or any signs of wear after a few laundry cycles. One of my cats likes to knead this blanket with his claws out, which would damage some fabrics, but this holds up.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves these blankets! I originally bought one for his crate, but had to buy another for his regular bed. He loves them so much! They are super soft and very well made. Every week I throw them in the wash with the darks and they come out looking brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle65

customer_reviews.title: Blanket has blue undertones
customer_reviews.text: I got this blanket to keep on the couch for the dogs because it repelled dog hair and specifically got this color because it said it was gray. One side is closer to gray but still not there and one side looks like a light blue. I also don't think it's worth $25 dollars-I thought it would be thicker/weightier. Also it costs $5.99 to return it. That's dumb! Returned a lot bigger of products and it didn't cost a thing. All UPS did was put a label on the plastic bag it came in. Won't go with this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Martin

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Loves It
customer_reviews.text: It is not I who loves it, it is Miracle who loves it. He has an enormous bed and the blanket is usually tucked into one corner where he cuddles up with it. Just to give you an idea of proportion: bed - Great Dane size, Miracle? 3 lbs. .03 oz. The blanket is perfect for him. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R. Lieber

customer_reviews.title: Not for a chewer
customer_reviews.text: It was a very nice blanket. I had hoped that my 5 yr old peekapoo would finally want to cuddle with a blanket, but no. He loved to throw it and chew it up just like he did as a puppy.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: Odin loves his cozy blanket, even bought a second for his other bed.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is super soft and holds up great to washing. I wash my dogs bed blankets about every 2 weeks, this really helps to cut down how often I have to break down and wash his beds, and then reassemble them. After many washes these blankets are in perfect condition and have remained as soft as the day they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bed!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the most amazing bed & blanket out there!! Our fur babies love these beds. I bought one for our lab, he sleeps on it all the time. I was so impressed with it that I bought another one within the week for our 17 year old cat. It makes me so happy to see her sleep so peacefully in this bed, at her she she deserves to be comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ROXANNE

customer_reviews.title: Blown away !!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was too good to be true! I have two Bernese mountain dogs and a yorkie. It’s hard to keep hair off the bed. I lay this across the middle and they will lay only on the blanket, which helps keep the bed hair free! Will probably purchase more for the couches and the camper.
customer_reviews.author: J&C

customer_reviews.title: Fussy dog loves this blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 year old Yorkie does not like most blankets, but when we put this one over he bed, she sniffed, pushed it a bit with her snout and got right to the business of taking a long nap. She loves it. It's marvelously soft, and she's discovered it is great for sleeping on her back, too. I asked her, and she gave it five barks!
customer_reviews.author: David F. Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Not just for dogs
customer_reviews.text: These don't pick up dog hair or dog smell AT ALL! With our old blankets, they would hit the floor once and be covered in dog hair that would never come out. These are the only blankets I buy now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly worth it. Very easy to clean, as advertised. We've washed it and it stays soft. Our dog can get stinky, but the blanket doesn't hold on to his odor after washing. He LOVES this blanket. Considering purchasing smaller blankets for the areas in our home that have been conquered and colonized by our cats, as it makes hair removal so much more simple.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Not really an XL
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in the XL size thinking it’d fit my XL dog (English mastiff). I would compare to a small child’s blanket. It’s nice and soft but the size is completely throwing us off, the dog doesn’t even fit on it. We are giving it to the kids to use and buying a large Costco blanket for the dog..... perfect for little dogs but don’t let the size fool you....
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: NOT TWO-TONED! Solid gray both sides.
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be two-toned and it is clearly all gray. So disappointed. Wanted two-toned to always keep the same side against the couch. Returning it!
customer_reviews.author: Proud to be a Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pamper Your Pet With PetFusion Dog Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Along with a new bed I ordered PetFusion Dog Blanket for my dog Abby. I rec'd it in 2 days, got it washed & dried & put it in Abby's bed for her to try out. The blanket is so soft & it washed & dried beautifully. I would definitely recommend it & I'm sorry I only ordered one.
customer_reviews.author: BgInAz

customer_reviews.title: My Pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is incredibly soft and so far it’s been very durable (got it about three months ago). My pup likes to take it with him when we go in the car, go to anyone’s house, and he also sleeps with it every night. I got him the medium size. He’s about 15 pounds and it’s enough for him to lay on and snuggle into it.If he wants to snuggle under it I have to help him. The medium fits great inside his crate and also inside his carrier. My pup loves it so much that I’m thinking of getting an extra large one for him on the couch. The blanket is also incredibly easy to machine wash.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Grenda

customer_reviews.title: Soft and hair catching
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, use it to protect my chair and it does the job! My dog loves to sleep on it so win win. Throw in the washer and dryer, shake out hair easily
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Spitzer

customer_reviews.title: Pet Hair Doesn't Stick
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is great for dogs that shed. Dog hair doesn't stick or lace into the blanket so it stays clean and dog hair free. Soft for personal use or for your pup.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I purchased this as my puppy is a "nester" in his bed, so I wanted a blanket to protect the bed. It has done a great job so far. He loves snuggling up with the blanket, as it is very soft. I have caught him chewing on it a couple times, but no damage! Great product - thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: Thinnest blanket I’ve ever seen. Disappointed. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamongirl031

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed With Durability
customer_reviews.text: I'm late to posting this review but unfortunately this blanket lasted about one month before it was destroyed by the washing machine. It went into the machine in tact and came out with a large vertical tear about 1" from the perimeter. My washing machine has never done this to any other item. I am surprised this happened as the reviews for the blanket seemed mostly positive - it's really too bad as my dog loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Masker

customer_reviews.title: Great dog blanket !
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs who are allergic to fabric softener. I was looking for a dog blanket that would wash well without having to use softener and still come out soft. This blanket does just that ! Great blanket !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.text: The reason for holding back one star is because I just started using the blanket even though I've had it for several days. All went very well with the ordering & it arrived well packaged & in good time. It's just smaller than I would have liked, but I should have given more serious consideration to the measurements that were provided. The material is super soft & lovely neutral colors on each side. I'm curious to see how it performs with the pet hair, meantime my dog is enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiniki

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof but soft and light.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket came up on amazon when I put in waterproof blanket. It is not waterproof! It is soft, light and I use it everywhere for my pup.
customer_reviews.author: Mariano Lara

customer_reviews.title: Dog Blanket
customer_reviews.text: MY dog loves this blanket and wants to sleep on it at night and in the day for naps. it is very soft and cuddly. I looked at a lot of dog blankets before I made my choice of this one. My dog loves it so I did good.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older cat and was looking for something to put down on her favorite corner of the couch. She curled up on it as soon as I put it down. Had to immediately order a second one because the younger cat wedged his way on to it, trying to shove her off. I ordered the small, and it is almost too small, so my second order is a medium. But it is incredibly soft and was accepted as soon as I put it down. I guess one for the dog's bed is next ...
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn216

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Animal Blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I love these blankets for girls. We have a Rat Terrier, American Bully, & Pit Bull. They all shed, and their does not stick to or in these blankets so you can actually get them clean. They are super soft and our girls love to sleep under a blanket so they are the perfect weight to keep them warm but not hot!
customer_reviews.author: Brandie

customer_reviews.title: Blanket is well made and hair does not get stuck all over it
customer_reviews.text: Thought by ordering the large size it would cover the large bed, but it does not. Fits on inside bolster area if that’s what you are looking for. Washes and dries well. Hair comes off easily with shaking and washing.
customer_reviews.author: Holly K.

customer_reviews.title: great all-purpose blanket
customer_reviews.text: A lovely, soft pet blanket, though it's fine for a human too. It's not fat plush, it's slender plush, a good cover for your bed or furniture or your pet's bed. Washable, dryable, and a very pretty color. Our pets curled up on it right away.
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: Nothing is tuff enough for pitties
customer_reviews.text: It didn't make it thru the night. I saw reviews on this being durable and hard to chew. My dogs ripped it to shreds. It's my fault because I know how they are. I'll just go back to using thrift store blankets for them.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffy

customer_reviews.title: Thin, but surprisingly heavier than expected!
customer_reviews.text: My doggie loves this blanket. It’s super soft and fuzzy and surprisingly heavier than it looks. It was a little smaller than I expected, that was my own fault in measuring though, and it still is perfect for my 25lb Beagle. I will definitely be ordering a few more for her.. Would love to see some bright, funky colors, but of course my doggy doesn’t care about that.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: It's super soft and fairly lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior Dachshund who weighs about 18 pounds. I ordered the small. It's just big enough to lay over her in bed, but not get too much in her way. I think she loves it! It's super soft and fairly lightweight. I'm secretly considering ordering a large for myself. :)
customer_reviews.author: Stacia L. Manion

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them, and way less pet hair everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and the cats LOVE the,m. I ended up buying 2 more I liked the 1st so much. Significantly less pet hair on the couch as well!
customer_reviews.author: GreySkye

customer_reviews.title: Nice cat security blanket
customer_reviews.text: Soft, washes very well, nice size. I have a throw on the sofa that our cat loves and I was so tired of it being covered in hair. So I bought this, hoping she would use it instead. She does! It sits on the back of the sofa and so does the cat! It's nice in the cat carrier, too. Something of a security blanket whenever we have to leave home.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cozy
customer_reviews.text: So far my dog really likes this blanket. She lets it be known when I forget to tuck her in at night. It's very soft and light weight. I'm glad I bought it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Pet blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the spot your fur baby likes to sleep. I use it for my sofa where my two cats sleep on the back top of the sofa . They love it and so do I keeps the hair in one spot . I throw it in the wash every other day and it comes out perfect . Smells good and is soft .
customer_reviews.author: Mark & Marysue

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love their blankets
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love their blankets. They fit perfect in the large sized dog bed and one of my dogs even carries it around sometimes. We finally transitioned the dogs out of our bed into the memory foam bed made by this same manufacturer. They love the bed and blankets and each go there without a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E. Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great Blanket!
customer_reviews.text: She loves it! I kept giving my Maltese blankets but they fell apart with little lint pieces from her nails. I bought this hoping it would not do that and it doesn't. She loves being wrapped up in it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M. Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use with our dog when traveling. Very soft and more importantly, the dog loves it. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lamb

product_meta.title: PetFusion Premium Pet Blanket, Multiple Sizes for Dogs & Cats. [Reversible Micro Plush]. 100% Soft
product_meta.description: Size:Medium (44 x 34")| Color:GreyGive your pet the warm and cozy pet blanket they deserve for their bed/ sleeping space. Stylish design and neutral colors blend seamlessly with your home. Triple duty as security blanket & furniture protector
feature_bullets: ULTRA SOFT & COZY: (I) Sized for medium to large dogs. (II) 100% polyester micro plush, suited for all 4 seasons. (III) Give your pet a greater sense of security.
PREMIUM MATERIALS & CONSTRUCTION: (I) Shed (pill) resistant. (II) Dense fibers. (III) Stylish in-seam.
DOUBLE LAYER REVERSIBLE: (I) Dark or light tone, you choose. (II) 200 GSM. (III) 44 x 34 inches
PROTECTS FURNITURE/PETBEDS: (I) Protects from scratching, clawing, & unwanted pet hair. (II) Great dog blanket for crate, car, couch, bed, and floor.
EASY CARE: (I) Machine washable. (II) 12 month for any issue resulting from a manufacturer defect. (III) Passes strict International safety tests
Age Range Description: All Life Stages

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
